name: Ascendant Wisdom
description: Discord throughout the galaxy has only increased with the anomaly crisis. For the Organians, this discord brings them pain and they can no longer find refuge. They take matters into their own hands, but their solution only create more problems.
rules:
-- This is an Anomaly Event! The following rule changes will apply:
1. Double antimatter bonus for featured trait crew (Cosmic). 100 antimatter bonus up from 50.
2. Double passive Victory Points gain bonus for featured event crew and crew with featured event trait. 60% bonus per crew up from 30%, 30% bonus per trait up from 15%.
3. Boss Encounters happen every 2 hours.
4. Bosses have higher base proficiencies, base Crit Chance, and Crit Chance increment. 300 Min Proficiency up from 200, 800 Max Proficiency up from 550, 15% Crit Chance up from 10%, 7% Crit Chance increment up from 5%.
5. Reduced antimatter penalty for losing contests. 12 antimatter penalty down from 50.
6. Voyage Encounters take place at the following points in time: 1 minute, 30 minutes, 1 hour, 2 hours, 4 hours, 6 hours, and every 6 hours after that.
-- In a Voyage Event, you will engage in Voyages with occasional Voyage Encounters that will test proficiencies of your voyage crew.
-- In this event, Gold and Silver skills for Voyages will be DIP and MED. 
-- Passing a Voyage Encounter without losing any contests raises the multiplier for Victory Points gained in contests. Losing a contest resets this multiplier.
-- Three of the following traits are randomly chosen for each Encounter: Inspiring, Explorer, Scoundrel, Casual, Playful, Hero, Marksman, Investigator. Using crew with matching traits increases their Crit Chance in contests.
-- Using Ayelborne, any version of Doe, O'Connor, Hedford, or Cosmic crew will provide a bonus to antimatter and a permanent multiplier to passively gained Victory Points.
-- Using the Species 8472 Bioship, the U.S.S. Voyager-J, the Miranda Class Ship, or ships with the Fighter trait will provide a bonus to antimatter.
-- Earn Event Victory Points passively by running a voyage, and actively by winning contests during Voyage Encounters. The amount you earn increases with every Voyage Encounter passed. 
-- Collect Event Victory Points to unlock Threshold Rewards!
-- In this event, Squadrons may also compete to advance up the Squadron leaderboards. Join a Squadron to get more rewards!
bonus_text: Bonus: Fighter (Ship trait), Ayelborne, Doe, O'COnnor, Hedford, or Cosmic

featured_crew.name: Trelane
featured_crew.flavor: Q's young son as a wedding planner? That sounds alarming.

action.name: What About Fusion Style? I Call This 'Hu-Can.' Or 'Vul-Man.'

featured_crew.name: O'Connor
featured_crew.flavor: O'Connor himself no longer believed that he would succeed in ascending and confessed this to Tendi when the ascension finally occurred.

action.name: I'm Gonna Do It! I'm Gonna Ascend!

rewards.flavor: Use to instantly revive a failed Voyage.

rewards.flavor: Honor is gained by dismissing crew who have served you well, but are ready for reassignment. Redeem in the Time Portal for exclusive crew, special fusion-related items, training programs, and more.

rewards.name: Merits
rewards.flavor: Merits can be earned by completing missions. Use Merits to acquire faction-based rewards, upgrades to your ship, and more.

rewards.name: Training
rewards.flavor: Increases crew XP by 2500.

rewards.name: Trelane
rewards.flavor: Q's young son as a wedding planner? That sounds alarming.

action.name: What About Fusion Style? I Call This 'Hu-Can.' Or 'Vul-Man.'

rewards.name: Rarity
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 5 Polestars: Common, Uncommon, Rare, Super rare, Legendary

rewards.name: Skill
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 6 Polestars: Command, Diplomacy, Security, Engineering, Science, Medicine

rewards.name: ISM
rewards.flavor: ISM, or interstellar medium, is the matter that exists between astronomical objects. It can be manipulated by the Q to facilitate crew retrieval. ISM can be obtained from Daily Log-in Rewards, Campaigns and participating in Fleet activities.

screens.text: "As observers of lifeforms throughout the galaxy, we can no longer remain silent nor uninvolved. The discord and pain have increased exponentially concurrent with the number of beings due to the appearance of the temporal anomalies."

"We have remained neutral for the burden falls to each species to overcome its own faults. However, your constant conflicts and strife have begun to impact our peace. We have thus enacted our own trials and restrictions, to guide you lesser lifeforms in the proper direction."
"'Lesser lifeforms'? 'Trials and restrictions'? What do they mean by this?! If they were so powerful, why not just jump to fixing everything? Why play games with everyone else in the galaxy?"

"Please calm down, my eager apprentice. The Organians may be misguided, but I believe they mean well. Perhaps it is guilt for centuries of being inactive observers. Still, we cannot allow their misguided attempt at guidance to go unchecked."
